notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Mei-Lin Tsai, Wei-Chao Lin, Mei-Ying Wang, Ya-Nan Zhang, and Ya-Ying Wang conceived the experiments; Mei-Lin Tsai designed the experiments; Mei-Lin Tsai, Cai-Di Lin, Keh-Ai Khoo, and Mei-Ying Wang collected the plant samples; Cai-Di Lin performed most experiments; Tsang-Kuei Kuan and Wei-Chao Lin contributed to analysis of composition; Mei-Lin Tsai and Cai-Di Lin analyzed the data; Mei-Lin Tsai and Keh-Ai Khoo analyzed literature and wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the manuscript.
